h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Elder Amourworm
content: Beyond this, most of its attacks will come in the form of simply using its weight to thrash about. You'll usually be able to see it coming when the worm twists around to prepare to swing its body toward you -- but a deflection using Rock Solid can stop the worm in its tracks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Elder Amourworm'.
The content is as follows:
Beyond this, most of its attacks will come in the form of simply using its weight to thrash about. You'll usually be able to see it coming when the worm twists around to prepare to swing its body toward you -- but a deflection using Rock Solid can stop the worm in its tracks.
